00045 volatile U8 cpt_sof;
00046 extern U8    rx_counter;
00047 extern U8    tx_counter;
00048 S_line_coding line_coding;

00059 void cdc_task_init(void)
00060 {
00061    uart_init();
00062    Leds_init();
00063    Joy_init();
00064    Hwb_button_init();
00065    Usb_enable_sof_interrupt();
00066 #ifdef AVRGCC
00067    fdevopen(uart_usb_putchar,uart_usb_getchar); //for printf redirection 
00068 #endif
00069 }

00074 
00082 void cdc_task(void)
00083 {
00084    if(Is_device_enumerated()) //Enumeration processs OK ?
00085    {
00086       if(cpt_sof>=NB_MS_BEFORE_FLUSH && tx_counter!=0 )  //Flush buffer in Timeout
00087       {
00088          cpt_sof=0;
00089          uart_usb_flush();
00090       }
00091       
00092       if (uart_test_hit())    //Something on USART ?
00093       {
00094          uart_usb_putchar(uart_getchar());   // Loop back, USART to USB
00095          Led0_toggle();
00096       }
00097    
00098       if (Uart_tx_ready())    //USART free ?
00099       {
00100          if (uart_usb_test_hit())   // Something received from the USB ?
00101          {
00102             while (rx_counter)
00103             {
00104                uart_putchar(uart_usb_getchar());   // loop back USB to USART
00105                Led3_toggle();
00106             }
00107          }
00108       }
00109 
00110       if ( cpt_sof>=REPEAT_KEY_PRESSED)   //Debounce joystick events
00111       {
00112          if (Is_joy_select())
00113          printf ("Select Pressed !\r\n");
00114 
00115          if (Is_joy_right())
00116          printf ("Right Pressed !\r\n");
00117    
00118          if (Is_joy_left())
00119          printf ("Left Pressed !\r\n");
00120 
00121          if (Is_joy_down())
00122          printf ("Down Pressed !\r\n");
00123 
00124          if (Is_joy_up())
00125          printf ("Up Pressed !\r\n");
00126 
00127          if(Is_hwb())
00128          printf("Hello from AT90USBXXX !\r\n");
00129       }
00130    }
00131 }
00132 
00133 
00134 
00146 void sof_action()
00147 {
00148    cpt_sof++;
00149 }
